name: shari-kovinth
description: **REQUIREMENTS:** • Use lite server. • Start with your template. • Use CSS reset loaded from a CDN. • All your CSS must be in an external stylesheet loaded with a relative path • Your Site Should coniain 5 content sections (For example if the webbpage is a retaurant. 1. header with logo and main nav 2. call to action (hero image) 3. lunch 4. dinner 5. footer with location/contact info • The header section should be fixed to the top of the page [ON DESKTOP] regardless of what section the user is viewing. • Lunch and dinner sections should contain at least 5 items that each have. - Image - Name - Short Description • Use flexbox ON DESKTOP to display menu items in two or more rows. • The footer section will includes the addiess hours, contact, (phone and address) and a link to the top of the page.
